name: Pasta al Limone
ingredients: 12 oz. spaghetti or other long pasta
3 oz. finely grated Parmesan (about ¾ cup)

name: Pasta with Chopped Pesto
ingredients: 1½ ounces aged Gouda or Parmesan, grated on the small holes of a box grater (about 1 cup), plus more for serving
½ cup olive oil, plus more for serving
12 ounces dried short ruffled or corkscrew pasta (such as fusilli, gemelli, or campanelle)
